name: jekyll-editor
description: Desktop application for managing static websites

scripts.clean: echo Removing dist, .nyc-output and coverage... && rimraf dist .nyc-output coverage
scripts.lint: echo Linting and autofixing src and test folder... && tslint --force --fix "src/**/*.ts" "test/**/*.ts"
scripts.static: echo Creating dist folder and copy static files... && mkdir -p dist && cp ./src/index.html ./dist/index.html
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean -s && npm run lint -s && npm run static -s
scripts.build: echo Compiling Typescript with... && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.test:coverage: nyc npm run test && open coverage/index.html

author: Zoltan
